list_definition.definition: (often with down) to be in, or move into, a position in which both the foot and the knee of one or both legs are on the ground

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She knelt (down) to fasten the child’s shoes
She was kneeling on the floor cutting out a dress pattern.
